text: Jeff Davis (born June 13, 1975) is an American writer and television producer. He is best known for creating the CBS crime drama Criminal Minds. He was born in Milford, Connecticut. Davis is openly gay. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1975 births Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from Connecticut Category:People from Milford, Connecticut Category:Screenwriters from Connecticut Category:Living people Category:Crime writers
title: Jeff Davis (writer)
